api_name: Belvo API Docs: Categorize transactions

body.raw:
{
    "language": "pt",
    "transactions": [
        {
        "transaction_id": "transaction_unique_id",
        "account_holder_type": "INDIVIDUAL",
        "account_holder_id": "account_holder_unique_id",
        "account_id": "account_unique_id",
        "account_category": "account_category_type",
        "value_date": "YYYY-MM-DD",
        "description": "transaction_description",
        "type": "INFLOW",
        "amount": "transaction_amount",
        "currency": "BRL",
        "institution": "Erebor Bank Brazil",
        "mcc": 1234 // required when account_category = CREDIT_CARD
        }
    ]
}

functionality:
# Documentation 📖

See detailed documentation for the **Categorize transactions** call in our [API Reference](https://developers.belvo.com/reference/categorizetransactions-1).

body.raw:
{
    "link": "d4617561-1c01-4b2f-83b6-a594f7b3bc57",
    "year_from": 2018,
    "year_to": 2019,
    "type": "yearly", // Note: Check the documentation to the right for more information.
    "attach_pdf": false,
    "encryption_key": "customencryptionkey",
    "save_data": true
}
